text:
Wisconsin´s 8th Congressional District is a district in Northeast Wisconsin, represented by Republican Mike Gallagher of Green Bay, Wisconsin.
POLITICS.
The Eighth is quite politically conservative. In the 2018 Election, when it voted to elect a Representative, Republican Mike Gallagher trounced Democrat Beau Liegeois, winning nearly two-thirds of the vote. It last elected a Democrat for the US House in 2008.
